tossup_question: -   –  Divide a unit segment into 3 congruent segments and remove the middle segment. Do this process a second time on each of the remaining two segments. If this process is carried out a total of n times, what is the sum of the lengths of the remaining segments?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) One-third to the nth power
X) One minus one-third to the nth power
Y) Two-thirds to the nth power
Z) One minus two-thirds to the nth power
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) TWO-THIRDS TO THE nth POWER
bonus_question: -   –  If a_(1) = 4 and a_(n) = 2a_(n-1) + 5, what is the value of a_(4) ? ANSWER: 67
